content.header1: Find a youth group near you
content.text1: Community is a party and we want to make sure everyone's invited. Ready to connect with people who want to do this together?

image1.alt: Group of friends from church sitting together, and talking.

content.text1: Youth is going to look different this fall. Whether you're watching online or planning to join our in-person gatherings, keep checking back here for all the details on how you can get engaged.

image1.alt: Two men inside of a building smiling and hugging.

list.title: Sunday
list.text: Jr. Highs (Grade 6–8) hang out on Sunday mornings for activities and discussions. Sr. Highs (Grade 9–12) participate in adult services with our wider church family.
list.imageAlt: Young woman sitting at a table and looking at her notes from Sunday teaching at The Meeting House.

list.title: Midweek
list.text: We gather to unpack what we learned on Sunday in small groups. We participate in relationship-building and engaging in our community. To find out when and where click “Get connected” button below.
list.imageAlt: Screen shot of Bruxy teaching during Sunday morning livestream at The Meeting House.

list.title: Small Groups
list.text: Small groups are the foundation of our youth ministry. We believe that relationships are built through consistent leaders connecting with a group of teens. Hangouts happen inside and outside of a regular midweek.
list.imageAlt: Team of pastors from The Meeting House sitting around a table and recording a podcast.

list.title: Retreat
list.text: You and your leaders from all our locations come together twice a year for a big family hangout. We focus on impacting the world we live in by creating experiences for faith and relationship development.
list.imageAlt: Kids gathering around a smartphone to watch a video from The Meeting House Kids and Youth curriculum.

content.text1: We've made significant changes in response to the COVID-19 pandemic. Find out what's changing as we head into the fall.

image1.alt: A woman wearing a mask looking directly at the camera.
A map representing locations of The Meeting House churches.

content.text1: It's pretty simple: we get together to build relationships, and find ways to love and serve our neighbourhoods as we learn to follow Jesus.
